parameters.text: No pending records that require re-submission.

parameters.ConfirmMessage: I have reviewed their submitted papers.
parameters.Header: Are you sure you want to approve this entry?
parameters.Message: This action will validate this entry!

parameters.Header: This entry will be marked "For re-submission"
parameters.Message: This will let the user know that they need to resubmit their papers if they wish for this entry to be approved.

parameters.Message: By confirming, the user has complied and has sent documents for verification.
Are you sure you want to remove this pending participation record?
This is the message that will appear when they hover over their entry's status.
